title: First Day Home
description: Thea's first day home from the hospital. So tiny and perfect!

title: Sweet Dreams
description: Sleeping peacefully in her crib. She looks like an angel.

title: First Smile
description: Caught her first real smile! My heart melted instantly.

title: Tummy Time
description: Working on those neck muscles during tummy time.

title: Bath Time
description: Her first real bath! She loved the warm water.

title: Morning Cuddles
description: Best way to start the day - cuddles with Thea.

title: First Outfit
description: Dressed up in her first cute outfit. So stylish already!

title: Story Time
description: Reading her first book together. She's so attentive.

title: Playtime
description: Playing with her first toys. Everything goes in the mouth!

title: Family Photo
description: Our first family photo together. Pure happiness.

title: Giggles
description: Heard her first giggle today! The sweetest sound ever.

title: Outdoor Adventure
description: First time outside in the fresh air. She loved it!

title: Rolling Over
description: She rolled over for the first time! Such a big milestone.

title: Teething
description: First signs of teething. Everything is a chew toy now!

title: Sitting Up
description: Learning to sit up on her own. She's getting so strong!

title: First Foods
description: Trying her first solid foods. Messy but adorable!

title: Crawling
description: She's on the move! Crawling everywhere now.

title: Standing
description: Pulling herself up to stand. Walking is next!

title: First Steps
description: She took her first steps! I'm so proud of my little walker.

title: Exploring
description: Exploring the world on her own two feet. So independent!

title: Dancing
description: She loves to dance to music. Such a happy little girl!

title: Reading
description: She's starting to turn pages herself. Future bookworm!

title: Art Time
description: First time with crayons. Creative expression begins!

title: Park Day
description: First trip to the park. She loved the swings!

title: Water Play
description: Splashing in the water table. Summer fun begins!

title: Birthday Prep
description: Getting ready for her first birthday party!

title: Cake Time
description: Her first birthday cake! She made quite a mess.

title: One Year Old
description: Happy first birthday, Thea! You've grown so much.

title: Party Time
description: Celebrating with family and friends. So much love!

title: Growing Up
description: She's getting so big and learning new things every day.

title: Little Explorer
description: Always exploring and discovering new things.

title: Today's Joy
description: Every day with Thea is a new adventure filled with joy.
